title: An Introduction to Military History
headline: Gain insight into the causes of the World Wars and the development of military technology in this free online course.
description: Military history plays a significant role in showcasing how wars fought in the past impact the future. This free online course will teach you the elements of ancient warfare and the causes and effects of the World Wars. You will also discover the qualities of an effective military leader and how they influence wars. Learn the methods and techniques of land warfare, the importance of naval warfare, advances in military technology and much more.
courseDescription:
The World Wars were the most devastating events of the 20th century. This course will introduce you to the diversity of military experience and the characteristics of conflicts in ancient times. You will discover the origin of military weapons and changes in military technology. Learn about the history of naval warfare, the methods of land warfare and the main characteristics of a military system.

Additionally, you will learn about the causes and consequences of the World Wars as well as the strategies and types of equipment used. Discover the characteristics of successful leaders and their impacts on combat, the ‘three spheres of war’ and the models for effective military leadership. Acquire skills to manage fear and maintain high morale to win battles.

Finally, you will gain insight into British military history, peculiar changes in the army and some details of major conflicts like the 1990 Gulf war. This course benefits a wide range of careers, from history teachers to curators at museums or army officers working in government offices. It will also interest anyone curious about military history in general. So sign up today and start learning.
